content.rendered:
Emily Morgan

Recruiting Operations Manager

BA in Criminal Justice and Psychology: University of South Carolina

 

ADVICE:

Advice for Candidates: Make sure your resume is up to date and always send thank you notes after your interviews!

 

HOBBIES AND INTERESTS:

I love taking spin classes, going to concerts, and watching any and every documentary on Netflix.

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. – Wayne Gretzky” – Michael Scott
